title: Manage Month-End Accruals
description: An accountant needs to create an accrual journal entry for expenses that have been incurred but not yet invoiced.

tasks.description: Identify services that have been received but for which no invoice has been received (e.g., consulting services).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies $10,000 in consulting services that need to be accrued.

tasks.description: Create an accrual journal entry to debit the expense account and credit the accrued liabilities account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the correct journal entry for the accrual.

tasks.description: Set up a reversing entry for the beginning of the next month.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent schedules the accrual to automatically reverse on the first day of the next period.
